name: First steps as a coder
body:
### First notes

Hi Everybody! My names is [Eugene]() and I’m glad to see you on my first blog. Several months ago I decided to learn coding and become a developer, for that reason I decided to join up [Makers Academy](). I had the one month [PreCourse]() and my [Main course]() starts next week, so I’m going to extend my blog by adding [new notes](), while I'll study and further.

***
[E-mail](a26052013@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
